Updated Tor Cloud images

16 Jan 2012

The Tor Cloud images for all the seven regions have been updated to include the _ anonymizing relay monitor (arm)_. This works much like top does for system usage, providing real time statistics for bandwidth, cpu, memory usage, current Tor configuration, connection details etc.

If you're already running a Tor Cloud instance and wish to install arm, connect to your instance with SSH and run sudo aptitude install tor-arm.
